entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How does translation of comparison operators work for converted values? #33208
  • Allow referencing the outside entity in filtered include #33207
  • Raw SQL queries for unmapped types - how to define enum properties to map from strings? #33206
  • How to handle Microsoft.Data.SqlClient new AccessTokenCallback #33205
  • 无法在项目设置里关闭mac的目标框架 #33204
  • The specified deps.json [D:\MyProject\MAUI\QA\QA.Client\bin\Debug\net8.0-maccatalyst\maccatalyst-x64\QA.Client.deps.json] does not exist #33203
  • Make model validation info/errors easily visible without having to look at logs #33202
  • Cosmos: Upsert #33201
  • Exception handling in DbCommandInterceptor's ReaderExecuted method #33199
  • RelationalDbContextOptionsBuilder.CommandTimeout should accept zero as a valid value #33196

Closed

  • Generate the compiled model during build #24894
    Backlog
  • ModelBuilder tests failing on PG because of problematic set comparison #33059
    9.0.0-preview2
  • Migration Name Length Constraint for Foreign Keys and Indexes Exceeding 62 Characters are trimmed automatically #33194
  • scaffolded one-to-many property names generate with incorrect name #32981
    Backlog
  • ETag value included slash to escape quotes #33064
  • Unecessary SELECT Inside LEFT Join #33067
  • Deleting an attached entity in TPH succeeds even if it is of the wrong type #33077
  • EF Core Incorrectly Translates DateTime.UtcNow in Queries to NOW() Instead of UTC Equivalent #33195
  • A query with complex properties returns data from a wrong table #33161

PullRequests

Created

  • Add quotability to all SQL expression types #33210
  • Fix inferred mapping application on Sqlite JsonEachExpression #33209
  • 33196 command timeout allow zero #33198
    blocked

Merged

  • Add OptimizeContext MSBuild target that runs on build #33049
  • Additional test for #32911 plus a small code correction #33200
  • Fix to #33183 - Complex property causes "The multi-part identifier "xxx" could not be bound" after GroupBy + Select(x => x.First()) #33197

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query (#32978) #33027
    Servicing-consider
  • Allow SqlFragmentExpression to have Type/type mapping #33053
  • [release/8.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33173
  • [release/7.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33174
  • [release/6.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33175
